name: Mage Armor
components: V, S, F (a piece of cured leather)
text:
An invisible but tangible field of force surrounds the subject of a mage armor spell, providing a +4 armor bonus to AC.

Unlike mundane armor, mage armor entails no armor check penalty, arcane spell failure chance, or speed reduction. Since mage armor is made of force, incorporeal creatures can't bypass it the way they do normal armor.
mythicText: The armor bonus increases to +6. There is a 50% chance that any critical hit or sneak attack made against the target is negated and treated as a normal hit, as if the target were wearing moderate fortification armor.
components_zh: 语言, 姿势, 器材 (一块鞣制过的皮革)
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh:
一层隐形但确实存在的力场在法师护甲的受术者周围出现，这对他的AC提供+4护甲加值。

与一般护甲不同的是，法师护甲没有防具检定减值、没有奥术失败率、也不会降低速度。由于法师护甲由力场构成，因此虚体生物无法像忽视普通护甲那样忽视它。
mythicText_zh: 护甲加值增加至+6点。目标受到的任何重击与偷袭都会有50%的概率被视为普通命中，就如同目标佩戴了中等护命（medium fortification）护甲一般。
